quotes.message: Let your mind be set free from the control of others influence.
quotes.name: Jeremy Limn

quotes.message: Every renaissance comes to the world with a cry, the cry of the human spirit to be free.
quotes.name: Anne Sullivan Macy

quotes.message: I am a wild woman, it would take a warrior to tame my spirit.
quotes.name: Nikki Rowe

quotes.message: One radical free spirit nonconformist is pretty much like another.
quotes.name: George Will

quotes.message: Here the free spirit of mankind, at length, Throws its last fetters off; and who shall place A limit to the giant's unchained strength, Or curb his swiftness in the forward race?
quotes.name: William C. Bryant

quotes.message: I am a free spirit. I tell the truth, and I like to mix it up.
quotes.name: Ed Rendell

quotes.message: There are incalculable resources in the human spirit, once it has been set free.
quotes.name: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.message: I realize I'm a free spirit. I like to be happy. I have to have more control of my happiness.
quotes.name: Chamique Holdsclaw

quotes.message: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: I die, as I have lived, a free spirit, an Anarchist, owing no allegiance to rulers, heavenly or earthly.
quotes.name: Voltairine de Cleyre

quotes.message: If you try to tame her she will fly away, because pretty little spirits like her, never like to be caged.
quotes.name: Nikki Rowe

quotes.message: I am living breathing freedom
quotes.name: Hiroko Sakai

quotes.message: He had a free spirit. He was so far-reaching, he's the person who likes the wind in his hair.
quotes.name: Carlotta Leon Guerrero

quotes.message: Your happiness doesn't come free, but you need to be free to be happy.
quotes.name: Nokwethemba Nkosi

quotes.message: I like to be a free spirit.
quotes.name: Princess Diana

quotes.message: A free spirit takes liberties even with liberty itself.
quotes.name: Francis Picabia

quotes.message: The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: I am a leaf on the wind.
quotes.name: Joss Whedon

quotes.message: They can't chain my spirit! My spirit runs free! Walls can't contain it! Laws can't restrain it! Authority has no power over it!
quotes.name: Bill Watterson

quotes.message: The human spirit: Unbreakable. Relentless. Free.
quotes.name: Garth Brooks

quotes.message: I'm a free spirit and that definitely comes from my upbringing, so it's definitely shaped me as an artist.
quotes.name: Neon Hitch

quotes.message: Release your majestic mind, embrace your untamed inner spirit. Break free from captivity, avoid society.. You were born to be free.
quotes.name: Melanie Muller
